About

RSS

I’m Jeremy Walworth. I’ve been working for Verizon for about 13 years as a devops engineer. I enjoy tinkering with Raspberry Pi’s, Arduinos, and amateur radio. I’m also a private pilot and member of a local flying club. I fly the club’s 182, 172, and RV-12.

This blog is where I plan to write about my (mis)adventures.
